jobDescription: Essential Functions and Key Responsibilities:Processing of optoelectronic devices.Prime duties include but not limited to:Processing of micro-electronics and micro-mechanical systems in a wafer fab environment.Duties may also include processing wafers through various production and measurement tools in Die FAB Operations.This can include: handling wafers, loading/unloading wafers, selecting tool programs, selecting recipes, and performing analytic measurements to determine if the process is in control.Minimum Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:Using microscopes to evaluate the visual appearance compared to goal.Entering measurement data into a computer database.Informing management and engineers of any unexpected results.Adhering to Fab safety and cleanliness guidelines.Accurately communicate tool and lot status to colleagues on the ensuing shift.Education Required: High School diploma/GEDInfinera is an equal opportunity employer.
